short_summary: Reissue of Solicitation of Offers. This solicitation of offers cancels and supersedes previous solicitation of offers number Doc4048342506 dated 27 July 2023 with a closing of 06 September 2023 at 14:00 EDT. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 16 November 2023 at 2:00pm EST.
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for landscaping services at various sites throughout Canadian Forces Base (CFB) at 17 Wing in Manitoba. The Offeror must attend the mandatory site visit on Wednesday, 01 November, 2023 at 9:30am CDT. Offerors must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than Close of Business on Monday, 30 October 2023 to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of their representatives. Canada will declare non-compliant offers from any Offerors who do not attend the mandatory site visit.
full_summary:
---

# Grass Cutting and Landscaping Services - Invitation to Propose

### Notice Details

#### Solicitation No: **WS4048249531-Doc4254678824**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites offers from qualified contractors for the provision of grass cutting and landscaping services at various sites throughout Canadian Forces Base (CFB) at 17 Wing in Manitoba.

#### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** 12 October 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** Cancelled (Original Closing Date: 30 October 2023 at 14:00:00)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 1 December 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 31 August 2025

#### Tender Method

This solicitation will be conducted through a Request for Proposal (RFP), which will be evaluated based on the lowest price. Bidders must attend a mandatory site visit on 1 November 2023 at 9:30:00 to be considered for this opportunity.

#### Evaluation Criteria

*  Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the following Trade Agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

#### Contact Information

For any queries or concerns regarding this solicitation, please contact:
Tanya Gostev
(PSPC)
[Email: tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.gostev@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL

The full notice, including the tender documents and attachments, can be accessed at:
